item.title: Flight Crew/Supernumerary Escape Devices – Observer's Seat Operative – Inertial Escape Reels

numlitem.para: One inertial escape reel is available for each crewmember/observer, and
Inoperative escape reel(s) is removed from installed location.
Occupants are limited to the number of operative escape devices.

placard.para: Placard near upper EICAS "# ESCAPE REEL(S) INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.
